text: Yake mandakarma sobhaniya kare dekhano haya, se take uttama mane kare, se ki samana ye mandake manda mane kare. Niscaya allaha yake iccha pathabhrasta karena ebam yake icacha satpatha pradarsana karena. Sutaram apani tadera jan'ye anutapa kare nijeke dhbansa karabena na. Niscaya'i allaha janena tara ya kare.
